name: part_001
file: tmp_【 3D LIVE 】Lapis Lazuli ⧸ 重大告知アリ！【 #鷹嶺ルイ重大告知LIVE 】 [PHrZ_dRSy_4]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'Overdo' by Takane Lui featuring Hakos Baelz.
MC section where Lui thanks the audience and introduces Hakos Baelz.
Performance of the song 'Baka Bakka' (ばかばっか) by Takane Lui.

subtitles.original: 死の国中　愉快に乗っかって
subtitles.english: Riding happily through the land of death

subtitles.original: 目ん玉草さを　押し付けられてる
subtitles.english: Being forced to accept the eyeball grass

subtitles.original: 何から何まで
subtitles.english: From everything to everything

subtitles.original: 仕草を辞めて　また耳鳴りなら
subtitles.english: Stop your deeds, and if it's ringing in the ears again

subtitles.original: 聞きお上手に　頷き合わせてる
subtitles.english: Cleverly listening and nodding along

subtitles.original: なぎ倒し　こしらえ
subtitles.english: Mowing down and preparing

subtitles.original: さあ　駄々々々　黙れ　黙りたまえよ
subtitles.english: Now, stop being selfish, shut up, please be quiet

subtitles.original: 癒えない内　そんな強い言葉は
subtitles.english: While it's still not healed, such strong words

subtitles.original: 少しだけ　静かにしてほしいね
subtitles.english: I want you to be a little quiet

subtitles.original: あぁ　私達　大亡命
subtitles.english: Ah, we are on a great exile

subtitles.original: 世界　デデデデ　僕やややや
subtitles.english: World (De-de-de-de), me (ya-ya-ya-ya)

subtitles.original: 果たせ　その日まで
subtitles.english: Until the day we fulfill it

subtitles.original: レレレレ　業やややや
subtitles.english: (Re-re-re-re), karma (ya-ya-ya-ya)

subtitles.original: 雨降る夜にも　やややや
subtitles.english: Even on rainy nights (ya-ya-ya-ya)

subtitles.original: 今日も起きない　そっちのけだね
subtitles.english: Not waking up today either, ignoring it all

subtitles.original: 家になるから　私一人でも　やっておきますね
subtitles.english: Because I'll become a house, I'll do it by myself

subtitles.original: 全て　全て　全て任せて
subtitles.english: Everything, everything, leave it all to me

subtitles.original: それをささせてよ　私のことなの　わかっているでしょう
subtitles.english: Let me do that, it's about me, you understand right?

subtitles.original: 死の国中　愉快に乗っかって
subtitles.english: Riding happily through the land of death

subtitles.original: 目ん玉草いま　今日も明日も　過ぎていくのでしょう
subtitles.english: Eyeball grass now, today and tomorrow will surely pass by

subtitles.original: みんな来てくれてありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you all for coming!

subtitles.original: イエーイ！
subtitles.english: Yeah!

subtitles.original: 一緒に歌ってくれたのは、ハコス・ベールズちゃんでーす！
subtitles.english: The one who sang with me is Hakos Baelz-chan!

subtitles.original: ルイ姉ー！
subtitles.english: Lui-nee!

subtitles.original: 嬉しいー！
subtitles.english: I'm so happy!

subtitles.original: 嬉しいー！
subtitles.english: I'm happy too!

subtitles.original: 花瓶に　水を　あげましょう
subtitles.english: Let's water the vase

subtitles.original: 時の中　しおれたこと　忘れてた
subtitles.english: I'd forgotten it had withered within time

subtitles.original: さあ　駄々々々　黙れ　黙りたまえよ
subtitles.english: Now, stop being selfish, shut up, please be quiet

subtitles.original: 癒えない内　そんな強い言葉は
subtitles.english: While it's still not healed, such strong words

subtitles.original: 少しだけ　静かにしてほしいね
subtitles.english: I want you to be a little quiet

subtitles.original: あぁ　私達　大亡命
subtitles.english: Ah, we are on a great exile

subtitles.original: 今と未来　見たかったはずなのに
subtitles.english: Even though we should have wanted to see the present and future

subtitles.original: 世界　デデデデ　僕やややや
subtitles.english: World (De-de-de-de), me (ya-ya-ya-ya)

subtitles.original: 見えぬその日まで　ドトトト　業やややや
subtitles.english: Until the day we can't see (do-to-to-to), karma (ya-ya-ya-ya)

subtitles.original: この世のことわり　やややや　今は　ゼゼゼゼ
subtitles.english: The truth of this world (ya-ya-ya-ya), now (ze-ze-ze-ze)

subtitles.original: 僕ササササ　あなたの街まで　形作るは　バッテン
subtitles.english: Me (sa-sa-sa-sa), all the way to your town, forming an 'X'

subtitles.original: さあ　世界　デデデデ　僕やややや
subtitles.english: Now, world (De-de-de-de), me (ya-ya-ya-ya)

subtitles.original: 果たせ　その日まで
subtitles.english: Until the day we fulfill it

subtitles.original: レレレレ　業やややや　雨降る夜にも　やややや
subtitles.english: (Re-re-re-re), karma (ya-ya-ya-ya), even on rainy nights

subtitles.original: 世界　デデデデ　僕らやややや　約束の地まで
subtitles.english: World (De-de-de-de), us (ya-ya-ya-ya), to the promised land

subtitles.original: さあ　駆け抜け　待って　待ってて　僕
subtitles.english: Now, run through, wait, wait for me

subtitles.original: オーバーロード
subtitles.english: Overdo

subtitles.original: ばかばっか
subtitles.english: Baka Bakka

subtitles.original: もういいじゃん　ムキになっちゃって　カッコつけて
subtitles.english: It's fine already, getting all serious, trying to look cool

subtitles.original: カッコよくない　そういうの　嫌になってんだ
subtitles.english: It's not cool, I'm getting sick of that kind of thing

subtitles.original: 放っといてよ　死にたくない
subtitles.english: Leave me alone, I don't want to die

subtitles.original: もういいじゃん　ヤケになってんの　嫉妬したり
subtitles.english: It's fine already, are you being desperate? Being jealous...

subtitles.original: じっとできない　聞こえないよ　耳塞いだって
subtitles.english: Can't stay still, I can't hear you, even if I plug my ears

subtitles.original: 言ってってくるじゃん　しんどいな
subtitles.english: You keep telling me, it's exhausting

subtitles.original: 僕は誰も　覗かないよ
subtitles.english: I won't peek at anyone

subtitles.original: だから僕のこと　そっとしておいて
subtitles.english: So just leave me be

subtitles.original: ウザいだけのバカに　ハイハイハイ　ウケる　またの越し待ってるねだとか
subtitles.english: To the annoying fools, "Yeah yeah yeah, funny. I'll be waiting for your next visit."

subtitles.original: 本当は怯えてる　吠えるだけの弱虫だったんだ
subtitles.english: In reality, you're scared, just a weakling who only knows how to bark

subtitles.original: 痛いくせに耐えて　ハイハイハイ　いつも平気なフリばっかりなの
subtitles.english: Even though it hurts, you endure it, "Yeah yeah yeah," always just pretending to be fine

subtitles.original: 僕は壁を貼ったまま笑う
subtitles.english: I laugh while keeping my walls up

subtitles.original: それ以上　近づかないで　怖いじゃん
subtitles.english: Don't come any closer than that, it's scary

subtitles.original: ばかばっか
subtitles.english: Baka Bakka

subtitles.original: ばかばっか
subtitles.english: Baka Bakka

subtitles.original: ばかばっか
subtitles.english: Baka Bakka

subtitles.original: やだ　ばかばっか
subtitles.english: No, Baka Bakka

subtitles.original: もういいじゃん　まだ怒ってんの　放っといてよ
subtitles.english: It's fine already, are you still angry? Leave me alone

subtitles.original: ホッとできない　見ないように　目を逸らしたって
subtitles.english: I can't feel at ease, even if I look away to avoid seeing you

subtitles.original: 付いてくるじゃん　やっぱり
subtitles.english: You keep following me, of course

subtitles.original: 転がったら起きればいいじゃん　失ったら探せばいいじゃん
subtitles.english: If you fall over, just get back up; if you lose something, just look for it

subtitles.original: それでよくない？
subtitles.english: Isn't that fine?

subtitles.original: 間違ったら直せばいいじゃん　嫌だったら辞めればいいじゃん
subtitles.english: If you make a mistake, just fix it; if you don't like it, just quit
